body: I don't understand what investors are pricing in here.
They obviously aren't pricing anything. Its just short short short because there is no other play because the dividends are toxic.

I don't see a graceful way out of the dividend trap. It's too obvious if this bounces off the bottom over and over and rallies in between  dividends. It's too easy to 100% win just by riding each wave and jumping off before EX day. And it can't go below zero therefore a short squeeze into meme stock is the only way back to sane valuations. I have no idea when. Could be as late as 2025. Could be next dividend.
